extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns whether or not a drive fault has been detected.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh if [ -f "/usr/bin/ipmitool" ]; then result=`/usr/bin/ipmitool chassis status | grep "Drive Fault" | awk '{print $4}'` if [ "$result" == "true" ]; then result="True" elif [ "$result" == "false" ]; then result="False" fi echo "<result>$result</result>" fi
